analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na ajjhattam dhammam paṭicca bahiddhā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na bahiddhā dhammam paṭicca ajjhattaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: na ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā dve

original: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: na bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā dve

original: Naajjhattārammaṇañca nabahiddhārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na ajjhatta ārammaṇam ca na bahiddha ārammaṇam ca dhammam paṭicca ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā dve

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā dve pe purejāte āsevane dve pe avigate cha
